short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track stock prices for selected companies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of the stock market with Stock Tracker, the Chrome extension for real-time stock price updates. Track your favorite stocks, add new symbols, and stay informed about price changes with ease.

Features:

Real-Time Updates: Get up-to-date stock prices for your favorite companies. Track Bank of America (BAC), Ford (F), Pfizer (PFE), and many more.
Customizable Watchlist: Easily add new stock symbols to your watchlist and remove those you no longer want to track.
Price and Change Display: View the current price and the price change for each stock at a glance.
Simple and Intuitive Interface: Our user-friendly interface makes it easy to manage your stock watchlist and stay informed.

How It Works:

Add Stocks: Enter the stock symbol of the company you want to track and click "Add Stock" to include it in your watchlist.
Remove Stocks: Easily remove stocks from your watchlist with a single click.
Automatic Updates: Stock prices are updated automatically every minute, ensuring you always have the latest information.

Why Choose Stock Tracker?

Ease of Use: Designed for simplicity and convenience, Stock Tracker makes it easy to monitor stock prices without any hassle.
Customizable: Tailor your watchlist to include the stocks that matter most to you.
Reliable Data: Powered by the Finnhub API, Stock Tracker provides accurate and reliable stock price information.

Download Stock Tracker today and take control of your stock market watchlist with real-time updates and a user-friendly interface. Stay informed, make better decisions, and keep your investments on track!
